txt.en: 'Help, Duvodiad! It was the Dragon-clan, those fiends. They have grown bold of late, probably because the young men and warriors went away.\n\n'This is meant to be the daily wood shipment, but as you can see, there has been an attack. Curse the Draig-lûth!'
'Brave warrior! Stout [placeholder]! You have done well, indeed! You do more to protect us than those White Hand guards and Overseers in Galtrev....'
'The Draig-lûth is cruel, [placeholder]. Be wary when you fight them!'
A shipment of wood from the Galtrev Lumber-camp was meant to arrive at Galtrev quite a while ago, but it was held up when the waggon-driver was attacked by hostile Dunlendings.
Defeated Dragon-clan thieves at the Galtrev Lumber-camp ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Dragon-clan thieves at the Galtrev Lumber-camp ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Dragon-clan brigands and thieves roam the Galtrev Lumber-camp.\n\nYou should defeat a number of Dunlending thieves to secure the Galtrev Lumber-camp.
Talk to Fraid at his waggon
Fraid awaits you near his broken waggon in Pren Gwydh, not far from the Galtrev Lumber-camp.\n\nYou should speak with Fraid and let him know that the woods are a little safer now.
